summary: This test module validates the behavior of the dynamic rate‑limit handler used in the proxy layer. It defines helper utilities to simulate user authentication and mock responses, then runs a suite of asynchronous pytest cases that exercise RPM/TPM limits, cache updates, priority reservations, and multi‑project scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure that the dynamic rate‑limiting mechanism correctly enforces request quotas, updates its internal cache, respects priority reservations, and operates reliably across different projects and users in the proxy system.
